name: open-r1/OpenR1-Math-220k
description: OpenR1-Math-220k is a large-scale dataset of 220k math problems, each accompanied by multiple reasoning traces generated by DeepSeek R1. This dataset, sourced from NuminaMath 1.5, is a valuable resource for researchers interested in mathematical reasoning and deep learning. The traces have been verified using Math Verify for most samples and Llama-3.3-70B-Instruct as a judge for 12% of the samples, ensuring a high level of accuracy. Each problem in the dataset contains at least one reasoning trace with a correct answer, making it an ideal dataset for training and testing mathematical reasoning models.
citeAs: @article{openr1_math_220k,   title={OpenR1-Math-220k: A Large-scale Dataset for Mathematical Reasoning},   author={open-r1},   year={2025},   url={https://huggingface.co/datasets/open-r1/OpenR1-Math-220k},    license={Apache-2.0},   note={This dataset consists of 220k math problems with reasoning traces generated by DeepSeek R1 for problems from NuminaMath 1.5. The traces were verified using Math Verify for most samples and Llama-3.3-70B-Instruct as a judge for 12% of the samples. Each problem contains at least one reasoning trace with a correct answer. The dataset consists of two splits. For more details, see the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/open-r1/OpenR1-Math-220k.},   keywords={Mathematical Reasoning, Deep Learning, Math Problems},   date={2025-02-10},   month={Feb},   day={10} }
creator: open-r1
keywords: Mathematical Reasoning, Deep Learning, Math Problems
